long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your experience on Acoustic Campaign with this unofficial extension. This extension automatically updates the browser tab title to match the current page title or mailing name within the Acoustic Campaign interface.
